name: Gnome
description: Gnomes are welcome everywhere as good-natured technicians, alchemists, and inventors.

bonuses.description: +2 racial bonus on saving throws against illusions.
+1 racial bonus on attack rolls against kobolds and goblinoids.
+4 dodge bonus to Armor Class against monsters of the giant type.

special_abilities.name: Illusion Affinity
special_abilities.description: Add +1 to the Difficulty Class for all saving throws against illusion spells cast by gnomes.

special_abilities.name: Speak with Burrowing Mammals
special_abilities.description: Can speak with a burrowing mammal (a badger, fox, rabbit, or the like). This ability is innate to gnomes.

special_abilities.name: Spell-Like Abilities
special_abilities.description: 1/day—speak with animals (burrowing mammal only, duration 1 minute). A gnome with a Charisma score of at least 10 also has the following spell-like abilities: 1/day—dancing lights, ghost sound, prestidigitation. Caster level 1st; save DC 10 + gnome’s Cha modifier + spell level.
